Senior Full Stack Developer

TechInnovate Solutions

Sofia, Bulgaria

Hybrid (3 days office, 2 days remote)

8,000 - 14,000 BGN per month Full-time Senior level (7+ years) Posted: February 1, 2024 Apply by: March 15, 2024

About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled Senior Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic engineering team. You will be responsible for architecting and developing scalable web applications using modern technologies. This role offers the opportunity to work on challenging projects that impact millions of users while mentoring junior developers and contributing to technical decisions.

As a senior member of our team, you'll work closely with product managers, designers, and other engineers to deliver high-quality software solutions. You'll have the freedom to choose the best technologies and approaches for each project while ensuring maintainability and scalability.

What We're Looking For

  • 7+ years of experience in full-stack development
  • Expert-level knowledge of TypeScript/JavaScript
  • Strong experience with React, Node.js, and modern frameworks
  • Proficiency with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
  • Experience with microservices architecture
  • Strong understanding of database design and optimization
  • Experience with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
  • Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field

Key Responsibilities

  • Design and develop complex web applications and APIs
  • Lead architectural decisions and technical implementations
  • Mentor and guide junior and mid-level developers
  • Collaborate with product managers and designers on feature planning
  • Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality standards
  • Optimize application performance and scalability
  • Participate in technical interviews and hiring decisions
  • Stay current with emerging technologies and industry best practices

About TechInnovate Solutions

TechInnovate Solutions is a medium-sized technology company (150+ employees) specializing in building innovative software solutions for enterprise clients. Our engineering team consists of 12-15 passionate developers working on cutting-edge projects.

We value work-life balance, continuous learning, and creating an inclusive environment where everyone can thrive. Our culture is built on collaboration, innovation, and delivering exceptional results for our clients.
